scripts.obfuscate: tsc && javascript-obfuscator tsc-out/Overmind.js --output src/Overmind_obfuscated.js --compact false --self-defending true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 1 --string-array-encoding true && javascript-obfuscator tsc-out/assimilation/Assimilator.js --output src/assimilation/Assimilator_obfuscated.js --compact false --self-defending true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 1 --string-array-encoding true
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
